name: Group Venture
description: An application that gives users an easy way to keep track of money lent and borrowed between friends especially for group outings. Fill out the form to log the transaction. Money expected in and due are displayed on the dashboard.
tech: MongoDB | Express JS | React JS | Node JS | Heroku

name: Trip Reel
description: A movie searching application. Users can browse through different movie genres or search for a specific movie by title. Once a movie is selected, the user can view the movie poster, description, ratings, reviews, and where to watch.
tech: Javascript | Foundation CSS | Flickety CSS | OMDB API | Utelly API

name: GeoMap-me
description: This application lets users share a favorite location and tag it on a map. The user fills out a quick message form, then a marker is generated using the user's geolocation.
tech: Sequelize | Express JS | Node JS | Tailwind CSS | Handlebars JS | Travis CI | Heroku | Jaws DB | Mapbox GL JS

name: Budget Tracker
description: A progressive web application where users can keep track of money earned and spent. Transaction performed offline are stored in a queue then uploaded once the application is online.
tech: Mongoose | Express JS | Node JS | IndexedDB

name: Workout Tracker
description: An application giving users a fast and easy way to track their workouts. For each workout completed, a chart and graph are dynamically updated so users can visualize their progress.
tech: Mongoose | Javascript | Express JS | Node JS

name: Note Taker
description: A simple application allowing users to write, save, and delete notes.
